For transcription projects, my rate begins at $50 per audio hour, depending on type of transcript and quality of audio/video. 

For escrow projects:
--Must have signed work agreement
--Completed work will be uploaded to the project workroom and posted to Private Message Board for review
--Release of escrow due within 48 hours of project completion

For non-escrow projects:
--Must have signed work agreement
--Completed work will be uploaded to the project workroom and posted to Private Message Board. The format will be read-only and non-editable until payment in full received.
--Payments due prior to release of completed projects

abstrac: Leading Web & Mobile App Development Company
bio: With more than 11 years of experience in the domain, company have established 1200+ customers from 40+ countries ranging from SMEs to Fortune 500 Companies. With registered offices in London & Singapore, our business alliances are operational in different part of United States as well. We are your one stop solution for all your web & mobile needs and our experience can help you to transform your idea into reality. Our rich portfolio proves immense experience in multiple domains and technical expertise in all web, mobile & related technologies. With a team of proficient designers and developers, we perfectly blend technology and creativity to build an enticing web or mobile user experience.

We do provide services in:
- Fixed Price where we need all the details prior so that we can make sure we are on the same page of the requirements. We work out details and after discussing with the technical experts we will provide you with a business proposal against the same which will include the estimated efforts and associated cost. In the case, there will be set milestones where other than upfront payment the rest will be made upon successful completion of certain phases.

- Hourly model where we will provide you with a tentative timeline of the project based on details shared and then you can hire resources from us directly. We call it My Team Model where you will have your IT team without any liability to continue afterwards at a very cost efficient rates.
